description: Episode 4: Has Justine proven herself to be tough? To be sexy? To please at the highest level? To Truly submit to me? I leave her completely unbound. I want her to prove to me that she can control her body and her reactions without the crutch of bondage. Electricity can be surprising; sometimes it will send unexpected jolts throughout your entire body. I want Justine to prove that she knows how to keep her composure. If I take her on as my own personal Electroslave I want to know I'm possessing a lady.
title: Justine Joli: Bobbi Starr Electroslave!
